text: Sir Lester Bryant Bird (February 21, 1938 - August 9, 2021) was the second Prime Minister of Antigua and Barbuda from 1994 to 2004. He was also a well- known athlete. He was chairman of the Antigua Labour Party (ALP) from 1971 to 1983. He became Prime Minister when the previous Prime Minister resigned. The previous Prime Minister was his father, Vere Bird. Bird Jr. was born in New York City.Roger East and Richard Thomas, "Profiles of people in power: the world's government leaders" (2003). Psychology Press, pp. 16-17. He went to the University of Michigan, and became a lawyer. Bird died on August 9, 2021 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Antigua and Barbuda Category:North American lawyers Category:Long jumpers Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Lester Bird
